151.title: Déogratias

notes: (Aire Libre)
Setting: Rwanda.

152.heading: Déogratias--Miscellanea.
152.title: "Là-bas si j'y suis"
152.author: Erwin Dejasse
152.appears_in: p. 118-124 in 9e Art : les Cahiers du Musée de la Bande Dessinée, no. 7 (Jan. 2002).
notes: (Jean-Philippe Stassen)

Begins: "À la manière des électrons libres, les personnages de Jean-Philippe Stassen semblent souvent n'avoir d'autre but que d'être ailleurs. Bande dessinée de l'errance, la question du lieu y fait figure d'enjeu majeur."

English summary (from p. 151): "Over There if That's Where I Am. Erwin Dejasse analyses a trait common to most of Stassen's characters: the desire to be elsewhere. He demonstrates how the artist moved from the representation of unrooted, interchangeable settings, to the anchoring of his stories in a given geographical and historical reality. This change of perspective particularly concerns Déogratias, an album devoted to the events in Rwanda."

153.title: Deogratias, a Tale of Rwanda
153.author: Stassen ; translated by Alex Siegel.
notes: Translated from the French.
Tutsi, the Hutu (African peoples), and genocide.

publication info.publisher: Entries consist of a biographical paragraph
